author: Kat McAndrew
comment: I used to love this app for recording feedback to my students. I recently signed up for 12 months of pro and for some reason this week I can no longer share the files properly via wetransfer like I always have and it will only share a txt version of the file which is utterly useless to me. Everything worked fine last week and now it doesn't work at all. It also wants me to sign up for pro per month on top of the 12 months I've already paid for. If it's necessary to pay for both, fine but I at least want to be able to share my files easily

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hi Kat, sorry for the inconvenience, you absolutely do not need to pay for the subscription twice, can you please email us at help@triveous.com so we can sort that out asap for you. We're working on adding the older way of sharing too (you will have an option of choosing one), it should be out in the last week of Jan or the first week of February.

author: Ayush Bhatnagar
comment: I bought the paid version about a year ago - now I have to pay extra (as in, a subscription) mainly because the design of the application has changed? I hate this! :-(  Also the moment I do a second recording, it automatically writes over the first file valid file. Not Cool. Important Audio Lost....! But either way, I have chosen to discard this application from my devices for good and move on to other Better Quality Ones. (Sighs..)

author: Rebecca Z
comment: I just realized that when you name the recording in the app, it does not get saved with the file. Now I can't play it in the app because I renamed it in a file manager. This is not good because it I want to back it up onto my computer or flash drive, I will not be able to identify the recording. Please fix it. I recorded a 3 hour lecture and paused it. I accidentally closed the app. Now the recording says it is 0 seconds long. The description says that the recording would be saved if the phone lost battery. Why did it lose the recording?

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hey Rebecca, sorry for the inconvenience, we're almost done fixing the issues we've had with Skip Silence and we should have it ready for launch by early next week, I'll update you as soon as it ready. Thanks

author: Simon Raistrick
comment: They keep finding new ways to make me have to pay again for my PAID FOR app. Last time might have been a mistake, but twice? They clearly have a policy of price-gouging users.  Ive also noticed the missed recording issue has been unresolved for years. This app is ok but the business practices are dodgy and the service cannot be relied on either from a business or technical point of view. You should avoid this app.

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hi Simon, The pro features are still fully available to you, you do not need to pay for that again. The new cloud features are fully optional. The recordings are missing only because they are absent from the file system because of a disk cleaner type application (they have been reclaimed for space) and have nothing to do with the app.

author: Terence Martin
comment: I've been a paid user for a while, but recently I've been using (or trying to) the app more frequently.   This has made me realize how unreliable it is; roughly 50% of all of my recordings end up being about a minute or so of silence instead of the 30+ minutes they should be.   Everything looks like it's recording, but when all is said is done it hasn't. I'm not sure what the problem might be, but it renders the entire app untrustworthy.  When it does work, it works well though.

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content:
Hi Terence, 

Sorry about this, this should not be happening, we've tested the app rigorously and we have never encountered this specific issue, can you please email us at help@triveous.com so we can look at this right away. 

Trust me, we will understand and fix the issue.

Thanks

author: Lumiens The Mad
comment: I purchased the paid "pro" version for better sound quality for my classes. Now they are making me pay again for web/cloud storage??? No...please return my ability to use different formats/bitrates, and allow me to purchase the "cloud" functionality if needed.

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hi Lumiens, You do not need to pay again and we do not offer more formats in any plan, since we faced a lot of issues with aac (it takes a lot of time to playback longer recordings), we've decided to support only m4a from now onwards, you can record in any bitrate in m4a, please let us know if we can help further

author: Ian Flukie
comment: The new up is a big disappointment, no longer a skip silence option, which is important to me and available in many similar apps. The ui is attractive, but I think that the update is all about the developer getting greedy and wanting to sell cloud storage, because the files are now bigger and longer after silence skip option has been removed 😐

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content:
Hi Ian,

Sorry about the inconvenience. Skip silence is a very important feature and it has only been temporary removed because we've discovered various issues with it and our new highlighting feature. We're working hard to fix the issues and we hope to have it ready by the last week of January. We will update you as soon as the fix is ready.

author: Zaza Asatiani
comment: I purchased pro version nearly 3 years ago but now I have to pay again. It's against of business logic.

author: Brad Worley
comment: Either I sound like a chipmunk, or I'm drowning...? WTH! This app is not good. The settings suck.

author: And García
comment: Mala, inestable, el formato en el que graba... ugh. Antes estaba bien, pero ahora está horrible
Used up so much data without warning. yes.

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hi, sorry for the inconvenience and this should not be happening, do you have Dropbox sync or our subscription service active?

author: Jeff Guymon
comment: I paid for this app once already. Please stop pushing your cloud services on me

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hi Jeff, The pro features are still fully available to you, You do not need to purchase our new cloud features as they are completely optional

author: Edward Frau
comment: I've paid for this app 2 times already in the last couple years, was a good app though. Now it's asking to pay again and this time is an expensive subscription. Thanks but no, plus the average smartphone today has 64 GB, who needs a cloud service for audio files? ------------------------------------------------------------------- Edit: It's true, the pro features are still available, but the cloud subscription kept popping up like an advertisement, which is why I don't like the new version. I suggest to Triveous to create 2 versions of the app, one for normal/pro and one for normal/cloud.

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hi Edward, The pro features are still fully available to you, You do not need to purchase our new cloud features as they are completely optional

author: Caleb Martin
comment: The newly updated interface is very nice looking, and it works well. The notes and other features seem like they could be useful to some people, though I don't have any use case for them. However, the subscription model doesn't make any sense; why would I want to pay for cloud syncing when I already have cloud storage via Google Drive? And the biggest disappointment is that even after the update and all their claims of "high quality recordings", you still only get mono output. Is it that hard to add stereo? I'll be using a different app.

author: Rebecca Chiba
comment: The new version is harder to use and needs more clicks from recording to play back making it useless to me. I'm so disappointed because this was so perfect for me before.

author: Cliff Ian Bustamante
comment: great

Do not trust this app with your recordings. All fine with happy tagging until you want to change phone or sdcard or recover from backup. The file list and tags all look fine but they are no longer linked to the actual file. No way to reconnect them even when they're in the same folder as the new recordings. ZERO SUPPORT. Useless.

author: Thaha S
comment: The best recorder i have found. Really nice designing and quality. I will buy it soon as possible for pro version. I hope all features and quality will be there even after purchasing it. Please Go-ahead😍 make more better and better. Don't lose the quality. That's the +point i liked more in this. And designing too. 👌👍 Fantastic ! Glad to find this @pp😊

author: Patrick Staudt
comment: Doesn't sync. The one reason I got this app was so that it would sync to Dropbox, and the feature works 0% of the time. There's a notification at the top of my device saying Voice Recorder is syncing, but the files never actually upload.

author: Fred Amaral
comment: I let sync option with Dropbox only when wifi was on, but it didn't work at all. It spent 4gb from my LTE plan!

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hi Fred, We've tested this thoroughly and this should not be happening, can you please mail us at help@triveous.com so that we can look into this, thank you.

author: Charlotte Adams
comment: Very dissatisfied, I recorded a conversation whilst on Skype and tge entire file now won't play and just freezes.

author: jew
comment: Boss, after resetting the my mobile, my older recordings are not able to sync with the app, all those are in a folder of Dropbox.

author: Jen G.
comment: I really like this app. I'd like to be able to sync my recordings with Google Drive. I believe almost everyone on Android has a Google Drive account. As such, I think it would be appreciated by many, many users. Otherwise, it's a great app.

author: PRASHANT Singh
comment: Good app for making a lecture notes . Or recording instructions for someone  with images

author: Святослав Навроцкий
comment: It really works, can be used in a split view and has beautiful themes. Nice app. Thank you

author: Alfred Doe
comment: help you record on a tape recorder, and have a timeline of your recordings.

author: Jeff Spinoza
comment: tags, gps tags, and images do not sync to dropbox

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: We're working on a new version of the app that syncs everything, can you please email us at help@triveous.com so we can extend you an invite to that

author: Daniel Nelson
comment: Perfect for doing what its name implies: recording audio easily

author: saurabh ludhani
comment: Hey i wanna know in mobile storage which folder does it make?

author: Meena Gnaidu
comment: I Love  this  app 💓
Good

author: Jason Maggiacomo
comment: Because of the recent update, and the forcing all PRO paid users to subscribe to a new monthly subscription Pro plan, mostly for cloud storage (which I don't need), I have giving this a 1 star rating.   I expected to keep the Pro featured I already paid for previously with this upgrade. Because I did not, I have downgraded to the old 4.0 version and will never update until you incorporate the pro featured I paid for!

reply.author: Triveous
reply.content: Hi Jason, The pro features are still fully available to you, we are not forcing users to pay for that, the cloud features are completely new and optional

author: F W
comment: *USELESS* for exam prep because it pauses on every recording repeat. How the hell did this get past the bug testers? Using a Note 4 that works perfectly.  Fix this issue and I will buy Pro. Otherwise, I'm using another app that lets me use the camera and record at the same time.

author: Anthony Mercuri
comment: It was my favourite recorder app, but recently there's a problem where it either records or plays back (I'm not sure which) choppy. It's like a CD skipping, every 1 second or so.  So it's completely useless for me now.

author: Sonya Carroll
comment: After Recording it always say file not found and there would never be any Recordings.

author: Federico Tonus
comment: I've lost some old records, where do files are stored ?

author: the diamond bullet
comment: Eeeeeeeehhhh voice is bad
"Paid future" - there is your 1 star. Enjoy.

author: mahesh pandey
comment: 77hhhh
